name: How to Get a Girl in 33 Days
name_original: How to Get a Girl in 33 Days
description:
An ultimate chance for a virgin high school boy!
"4 Chances to transfer school.
Look for the girl of my dream within that time!"


'Ask me anything if you need help!'
She looks after me like a childhood friend!


'Wat, you're... a transfer student? Not interested.'
"Kinda chic, kinda kind!
She's such a Tsundere!"


Steven! Are you really transferring to my school?! I'm sooo glad!!!'
"My first love,
and fate brought us together again!"


I've still got much to learn but.. I'm looking forward to it!'
"Can I really like her...?
She is my forbidden love!"


You. You've seen me from somewhere? If not, nevermind.'
"The official school celeb!
She is out of my league!"


At which School can the girl of my dream be?
New school, flirt with new female students.
A Grand Love-Transfer Project!
